plot: Mr. Burns falls in love with a younger woman and recruits Homer to help him impress her.

Burns falls in love with Gloria, a traffic cop much younger than himself and, encouraged by Homer, begins to date her. She even agrees to marry him but their plans are thwarted by the return of the convict Snake, her old flame. And indeed things turn very heated indeed as Homer starts a fire from which he and Burns have to be rescued.—don @ minifie-1
